product.title: Fakiya 5-in-1 Curling Iron Set: Automatic Curler (Ceramic Coated), 3 Adjustable Modes, Hot Air Brush - Quick Dry, Anti-Frizz
product.description: The Fakiya 5-in-1 curling iron set: dry, curl, straighten, volume, and control frizz—all in one! . The rotating blow dryer mode dries hair faster than traditional hair dryers, while the automatic curling iron mode uses a 55°C constant-temperature ceramic barrel to automatically wrap hair around the strands, creating long-lasting, bouncy curls. Innovative anti-frizz ion technology releases negative ions to smooth frizz, while intelligent temperature control and a honeycomb mesh shield for even heat dissipation effectively reduce the risk of heat damage. Whether you're styling wet hair to prevent frizz, creating volume and a high crown for fine hair, or smoothing and smoothing split ends for coarse hair, the Spitcale 5-in-1 Smart Hair Dryer is the perfect solution. It features dual overheat protection and burn-resistant teeth (
product.description_html: The Fakiya 5-in-1 curling iron set: dry, curl, straighten, volume, and control frizz—all in one! . The rotating blow dryer mode dries hair faster than traditional hair dryers, while the automatic curling iron mode uses a 55°C constant-temperature ceramic barrel to automatically wrap hair around the strands, creating long-lasting, bouncy curls. Innovative anti-frizz ion technology releases negative ions to smooth frizz, while intelligent temperature control and a honeycomb mesh shield for even heat dissipation effectively reduce the risk of heat damage. Whether you're styling wet hair to prevent frizz, creating volume and a high crown for fine hair, or smoothing and smoothing split ends for coarse hair, the Spitcale 5-in-1 Smart Hair Dryer is the perfect solution. It features dual overheat protection and burn-resistant teeth (<45°C contact with scalp) for safe use. Complete tool set: main unit, hair dryer head, curling iron set (1.2-inch barrel), brush, clips, and gloves
product.description_full:
The Fakiya 5-in-1 curling iron set: dry, curl, straighten, volume, and control frizz—all in one! . The rotating blow dryer mode dries hair faster than traditional hair dryers, while the automatic curling iron mode uses a 55°C constant-temperature ceramic barrel to automatically wrap hair around the strands, creating long-lasting, bouncy curls. Innovative anti-frizz ion technology releases negative ions to smooth frizz, while intelligent temperature control and a honeycomb mesh shield for even heat dissipation effectively reduce the risk of heat damage. Whether you're styling wet hair to prevent frizz, creating volume and a high crown for fine hair, or smoothing and smoothing split ends for coarse hair, the Spitcale 5-in-1 Smart Hair Dryer is the perfect solution. It features dual overheat protection and burn-resistant teeth ( * The curling iron offers three temperature settings: 60°C (gentle) for fine/damaged hair, 100°C (medium) for beach waves, and 140°C (intense) for thick/coarse hair. The digital thermostat has an accuracy of ±2°C.Intelligent Anti-Scald Care: Constant heat and a continuous release of negative ions neutralize static electricity, reducing frizz and split ends at the root. Three precise temperature settings significantly minimize heat damage, leaving hair healthier and stronger.Zero Heat Damage: Powerful air pressure technology (110,000 RPM) allows for contactless styling, eliminating the tearing and damage of heat. Create naturally voluminous curls in just 3 minutes, especially for fine hair. Complete tool set: main unit, hair dryer head, curling iron set (1.2-inch barrel), brush, clips, and gloves. Salon-level efficiency, home convenience.
 * Intelligent Anti-Scald Care: Constant heat and a continuous release of negative ions neutralize static electricity, reducing frizz and split ends at the root. Three precise temperature settings significantly minimize heat damage, leaving hair healthier and stronger.
 * Zero Heat Damage: Powerful air pressure technology (110,000 RPM) allows for contactless styling, eliminating the tearing and damage of heat. Create naturally voluminous curls in just 3 minutes, especially for fine hair. Complete tool set: main unit, hair dryer head, curling iron set (1.2-inch barrel), brush, clips, and gloves. Salon-level efficiency, home convenience.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
